meaningMnemonic: If the <radical>rain</radical> touches your <radical>foot</radical> and gives it a little rain <radical>kiss</radical>, you know that part of your foot is <kanji>expose</kanji>d to the elements. You can also see some <kanji>dew</kanji> forming on your exposed foot. So that's what rain kisses are!
readingMnemonic: You run along the <reading>ro</reading>ad (ろ), trying to get out of the rain, but the road keeps going and going, with walls on both sides.
